title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Training for Online Information Evaluation and Utilization Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate or higher knowledge in specialized domains (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can judge information reliability with over 80% accuracy by applying at least three online information source evaluation frameworks (e.g., CRAAP Test)
Learners can systematically search for high-quality information to solve scientific problems in simulation environments and write expert-level decision-making reports (5+ pages)
Learners can identify bias/objectivity in online information during VR-based training and develop strategies to reduce expert decision-making errors by over 30%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
